actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to change the names of a dam and reservoir on the Salt River, Missouri, from the "Clarence Cannon Dam and Reservoir" to the "Mark Twain Lake and Clarence Cannon Dam".

summary.text: Redesignates the Clarence Cannon Dam and Reservoir, Missouri, as the Mark Twain Lake and Clarence Cannon Dam.

titles.title: A bill to change the names of a dam and reservoir on the Salt River, Missouri, from the "Clarence Cannon Dam and Reservoir" to the "Mark Twain Lake and Clarence Cannon Dam".
